section.title: Disable SMART Disk Monitoring Support
section.para:
Disable SMART disk monitoring support (smartd). SMART (Self-Monitoring, Analysis, and Reporting Technology) is a feature of hard drives that allows them to detect symptoms of disk failure and relay an appropriate warning. Leave this service running if the systemâ€™s hard drives are SMART-capable. Otherwise, disable it.
